title: Risk And Reward: The Challenges Of Commerical Spaceflight + A New Era Of Mobile Payments
teaser: RISK AND REWARD: THE CHALLENGES OF COMMERICAL SPACEFLIGHT: We get the latest on the explosions last week of a piloted Virgin Galactic spaceship and an unmanned commercial rocket in Virginia, and learn about the risks and rewards NASA is weighing as private companies increasingly take over vital functions in space travel. (19 min.) A NEW ERA OF MOBILE PAYMENTS: The launch of Apple Pay sparks a new era of competition in the arena of mobile payments, as a group of major retailers say they'll hold out for a system that doesn't loop in credit card companies. (31 min.)
